data.title: Mr. and Mrs. Stick Person
data.solution:
# Dictionary of faces
faceDict = {
    "Sleepy": "U.U",
    "Shocked": "O.O",
    "Owl": "OwO",
    "Bruh": "-_-",
    "Glee": "^-^"
}

# ASCII representations
hat ='''_____
|___|'''

body = '''__|__
  |
 / \\
/   \\'''

fullName = input().split() # Take input and split it 
hasHat = fullName[0] in ("Mr.", "Mrs.")  # Check for honorifics

 # Set the faceName, taking into account that it could be the first or second word in the input.
if hasHat:
    faceName = fullName[1]
else:
    faceName = fullName[0]

# Print the stick persson!

if hasHat: print(hat)

print(" " + faceDict[faceName])

print(body, end = "")
data.statement:
In the whimsical world of ASCII Art, the inhabitants are stick people, each with unique expressive faces that capture their emotions. The fanciest stick people are addressed with the honorifics {{Mr. }} or {{Mrs. }} followed by their name. This indicates their esteemed status in society, and as such they are permitted to wear a hat.

Your task is, given the name of a stick person (sometimes preceded by an honorific), draw an ASCII portrait of them. Esteemed stick people (those with honorifics) always wear a hat.

A hat looks as follows:
```_____
|___|```
The different possible names, and their corresponding faces look as follows:
```Sleepy  -> U.U
Shocked -> O.O
Owl     -> OwO
Bruh    -> -_-
Glee    -> ^-^```
All stick people have the same body. It looks like this:
```__|__
  |
 / \
/   \```
data.inputDescription: A string [[fullName]]. This is composed of one or two substrings: only the [[name]], or the [[name]] preceeded by {{Mr. }} or {{Mrs. }}.
data.outputDescription: A picture drawn in ASCII of the stick person described by their name.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

In the whimsical world of ASCII Art, the inhabitants are stick people, each with unique expressive faces that capture their emotions. The fanciest stick people are addressed with the honorifics Mr. or Mrs. followed by their name. This indicates their esteemed status in society, and as such they are permitted to wear a hat.

Your task is, given the name of a stick person (sometimes preceded by an honorific), draw an ASCII portrait of them. Esteemed stick people (those with honorifics) always wear a hat.

A hat looks as follows:
_____
|___|

The different possible names, and their corresponding faces look as follows:
Sleepy  -> U.U
Shocked -> O.O
Owl     -> OwO
Bruh    -> -_-
Glee    -> ^-^

All stick people have the same body. It looks like this:
__|__
  |
 / \
/   \





   

      
Input

      
A string fullName. This is composed of one or two substrings: only the name, or the name preceeded by Mr.  or Mrs. .

   

   

      
Output

      
A picture drawn in ASCII of the stick person described by their name.

   

   

      
Constraints

      
name ∈ { Sleepy, Shocked, Owl, Bruh, Glee }
Length of fullName < 20

   

   

      
Example

      

         

            
Input

            
Mr. Glee

         

         

            
Output

            
_____
|___|
 ^-^
__|__
  |
 / \
/   \
